GeniusUpdated on 13 Mar 2019You can purchase stocks listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange through local brokerages like OCBC Securities, Phillip Securities, Maybank Kim Eng, KGI Securities, Saxo Capital Markets, CIMB Securities, Standard Chartered, UOB Kay Hian, DBS Vickers and Citibank.However, it would be wise to consider the fees that you might incur when buying stocks. These fees include commission fees, currency conversion fees, custodian fees, clearing fees and taxes from handling dividends.
